segments.text: Good morning , sir.Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to see the manager.Here ' s my card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr.Wang.Do you have an appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm afraid I don't . Is it possible for me to see him now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid Mr.Li is engaged at the moment . Would you mind waiting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how long will it be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . I can't wait that long . I have another appointment at ten .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can the Assistant Manager meet you instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have discussed the details about sales of our new equipment with the manager on the telephone yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to make another appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I suppose that's the best thing I can do for now . I'll be here on Thursday morning at 10 o'clock . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'll make a note of that and ask Mr.Li to confirm .
segments.speaker: S1
